channel.title: Save America, Save - A Financial Services Podcast with Charlie Epstein
channel.description: We create greater clarity, confidence and the capabilities for entrepreneurs, medical practitioners, 401k participants and retirees to maximize the power of their financial future. Our goal is to help you generate a "paycheck for life" to pay for all the things you desire to do and to live a fulfilling and engaged life.
channel.itunes:author: Charlie Epstein
channel.itunes:subtitle: Learn all the tips, tricks and more to better prepare yourself for the future.
channel.itunes:summary: We create greater clarity, confidence and the capabilities for entrepreneurs, medical practitioners, 401k participants and retirees to maximize the power of their financial future. Our goal is to help you generate a "paycheck for life" to pay for all the things you desire to do and to live a fulfilling and engaged life.
